short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sorts Google Maps results by number of reviews

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically sorts Google Maps results based on the number of reviews, allowing you to quickly see the most popular and highly-rated places. It's perfect for discovering the best spots in an area, whether for tourism, dining, or any other service. Simplify your search and save time by directly accessing the establishments most favored by users.
